from.info: Traded Braydon Coburn to Lightning for Radko Gudas, 2015 first round pick (Rangers pick if Lightning pick is #1 overall, else Lightning pick), 2015 third round pick on 2015-03-02

Traded Kimmo Timonen to Blackhawks for 2015 second round pick, 2016 conditional round pick (third round if Blackahawks win 2 playoff rounds in 2015 and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, else fourth round) on 2015-02-27

to.info: Traded Andrew MacDonald to Flyers for Matt Mangene, 2014 third round pick (#78-Ilya Sorokin), 2015 second round pick on 2014-03-04

from.info: Traded Tye McGinn to Sharks for 2015 third round pick on 2014-07-02
Traded Braydon Coburn to Lightning for Radko Gudas, 2015 first round pick (Rangers pick if Lightning pick is #1 overall, else Lightning pick), 2015 third round pick on 2015-03-02

to.info: Traded Steve Mason to Flyers for Michael Leighton, 2015 third round pick on 4013-04-03

from.info: Traded Scott Hartnell to Blue Jackets for R.J. Umberger, 2015 fourth round pick on 2014-06-20

Traded Kimmo Timonen to Blackhawks for 2015 second round pick, 2016 conditional round pick (second round if Blackhawks advance to 2015 Stanley Cup Finals and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, third round if Blackhawks advance to third round of 2015 playoffs and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, else fourth round) on 2015-02-27
